main event: A strange, glowing object was observed by three individuals near Wilmer, Alabama on April 19, 1967.
interesting points: The object was described as being gourd or light bulb shaped, with a vertical orientation and a large, flat bottom.
The object emitted a very bright, intense yellow-orange light from the bottom, and had a reddish cast around the edges.
The object moved slowly in a southwesterly direction and then disappeared in place, with no observed maneuvers.
The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes and was observed from an automobile and a nearby home.
The observers were familiar with aircraft in the area and stated that no known air traffic was present at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: a strange, glowing, gourd or light bulb shaped object
witnesses: three observers, including a husband and wife
